text: Wish You Were Here is the title track of the Pink Floyd album Wish You Were Here. == Background == The song is a tribute to Syd Barrett. The song is mainly made up of acoustic guitar (David Gilmour), with keyboards (Richard Wright), drums (Nick Mason), and bass guitar (Roger Waters). Category:1975 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Pink Floyd songs Category:Wyclef Jean songs Category:Progressive rock songs
title: Wish You Were Here (song)
